patthana17.26:4.1: Pītisahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:5.1: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:6.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:7.1: Hetuyā ekavīsati, adhipatiyā ekavīsati … pe … avigate ekavīsati.
